title: Trojan Detection Container (ICSI)
technique: Weight Analysis with Gradient Boosting Classifier
technique_description: Extracts statistics from weights of the first layer for each model; Trains the features on the tuned Gradient Boosting Classifier.
technique_changes: Building on the statistics, extracting singular values from the weight of the first layer as additional features.

train_gbm_param_learning_rate.description: How fast the classifier is learning.

train_gbm_param_max_depth.description: The maximum depth of the individual regression estimators.

train_gbm_param_min_samples_split.description: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

train_gbm_param_min_samples_leaf.description: The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

train_gbm_param_max_features.description: The number of features to consider when looking for the best split.
